title: Cucumber Tea Sandwiches
directions: Cut slices of cucumber into thirds or quarters. Place on half of the Gluten Free Original Pretzel Crisps Minis.
Spread or pipe cream cheese on top of cucumbers, then sprinkle with dill. Top with another mini to make itty bitty gluten free tea sandwiches.
ingredients: 24  Snack Factory Gluten Free Original Pretzel Crisps Minis
1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, or more as needed
